body.name: MAGIC JOHN 2 Pack Screen Protector for Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra - Ceramic Film, Fingerprint ID Compatible, Easy Installation, Shock-Resistant, 3D Curved, Bubble Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 35 mins
features: [Ceramic Film Material] 6 layers of material material protection, from the explosion-proof layer to the oil repellent anti-fingerprint layer for material upgrade. Compared to TPU material, it is easier to install, more anti-fall, and more anti-fingerprint.
[Fingerprint ID] Ceramic film is a new material specifically designed to be compatible with Galaxy S23 Ultra ultrasonic fingerprint scanner.

[7H Hardness] Galaxy S23 Ultra screen protectors are created from 7H hardness material to protect your screen from daily wear, such as dust, oil and fingerprint smudges, and can offer some protection in the event of a drop!

[Screen Protector Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra Screen Protector 6.8"] Specially designed ONLY for Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra Screen Protector 6.8", 100% touch accurate. Not compatible with any other iPhone models.
[HD Clarity] Ultra-clear glass ensures amazing clarity for viewing experience and Face-ID compatibility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best screen protector i've tried for the s23 ultra!
reviews.reviewText: i've tried multiple other screen protectors since i got this phone for my anniversary almost a year ago... i was (and still am) so paranoid of damaging my new phone. most of the other screen protectors i've gotten have been... bad. curved edges not staying down, fingerprint sensors not working, glass with glue only around the edges and dust gets under it... weirdly textured pve covers....this one is by far the best. it was extremely easy to put on. word of warning, the "dust magnet sticker" is WAAAAAY stickier than i'm used to. be careful when you get to that step. i wasn't expecting the level of sticky and i pulled my phone right out of the little mounting cradle frame thingie that's included in the kit. because if this i ended up getting a tiny bit of dust under the edge of the protector at the bottom of my phone. i thought i had screwed it because it was somewhat noticeable when i did it. but i chose to ignore it for the time being. unexpectedly, by the next day, my flub was nearly invisible. you can find it if you look for it, but it nearly vanished.anyway. it looks great, it feels GREAT... smooth like glass... not plasticky feeling at all. the fingerprint reader still worked even without needing to reprogram it, and installation was a breeze. i would recommend this protector to anyone, and will gladly buy again if i need to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to install, works great!
reviews.reviewText: I have bought and installed many screensavers for my phone. This screensaver was the easiest screensaver I have ever installed on a phone. It installed very easily perfectly and with absolutely no bubbles. It is awesome! I would highly recommend this to anyone. My fingerprint reader still works perfectly and everything on the phone works just the way it does without the screensaver. Best screensaver I've ever bought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Initial impressions:Likes:- You don't notice it is installed unless you are looking for it- Feels smooth like glass- Install tools made installation mostly painless (but not completely)- Fingerprint works but sometimes have to press a little harder than normalDon't like:- Had number of bubbles at the edges of the screen and no trick would push them out. Only way I as able to fix it was to use the harder plastic sheet from the cover to pry up the edge a bit to be able to use the tool to smooth it down without trapped air. The instructions need to be improved about how to deal with the bubbles instead of pretending that following the instructions will not result in any or that they can be worked out with the tool.- After 2 weeks my screen started to have bubbles along the edge of the screen but I was able to push them out and it has stayed adhered to my phone since.- My 10 month old likes to play with my phone and bite it and because of him biting it he has left some indentations on it from his teeth and I have put indents on it from my fingernails.Overall it is a good protector and will protect your phone screen from getting scratches but it is a plastic protector and will not keep your screen from breaking so just keep that in mind. I do recommend this one because out of all the plastic protectors I have bought this is the best one by far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the first time i have every gotten a product that tells the truth about ease of install and fingerprint system working after install. I think this was the smoothest install I have ever had and not one air bubble. i have had multiple protectors on my s23 ultra and it has been hit of miss with the finger print reader working. Or the other thing is the protector does not work with the protective case. this product did bot so i think from here out i will be looking for majic john products first for my new phones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great screen protector
reviews.reviewText: I ordered what I thought was the Magic John from a random ad but turned out to be a fake. This one from Amazon is the real deal. Was easy to put on and so far no scratches. The screen is now resistant to fingerprints and smudges. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They hit it out of the park with this product!
reviews.reviewText: My goodness, it only took 20 years, but someone finally developed the ABSOLUTE BEST and easiest way to install a screen protector. I strongly advise anyone who purchases this to watch the recommended installation video 2 or three times (it's very short) so you can just kind of smoothly go throught the process. And smoothly is the keyword. This was so easy, and the results were so impressive. Even better this protector is so thin and flush with the screen that it doesn't even feel like there is one on. Great product! **Now make one of this privacy screen protectors with this easy to use method and I'm sure you'll have a number of sales**

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good but NOT great
reviews.reviewText: Not exactly as advertised. Kit comes with 2 screen protectors thankfully, cause I had to use both. I’ve installed many iPhone screen protectors so I’m not a novice. It’s advertised as you can install it with dust on your screen and that when installing it will with little effort get the bubbles out from under the new protector. FALSE! I cleaned my phone screen Very well but when I installed the first protector, there was a huge bubble that would not go away no matter what I did. It seems like the new screen protector already had something under it when I installed it. So, I had to take it off and install the 2nd one. I will say that one went on a lot better but still had to work some bubbles out.The advertisement states this screen protector has security built in, it does NOT, if that is a concern to you. You can still read/see the screen when the phone is turned to the side.I will say the touchscreen does work well.
Muy fácil de instalar no se quedan burbujas ni huellas ni susiedad

Got the first attempt almost perfect with tiny lint right at middle. Note to never touch side that goes into the screen or else you'll be needing a new one, just like what happened to me. With 2 attempts it was bubble free, the video guide was helpful. It looks clear, material a lot thicker than other TPU materials. Finger print scanner good, not super responsive due to thickness, need to go a bit slow. It picks up a lot of finger smudge. Fitting spot on my spigen case protector. Camera cut out noticeable when watching videos as it sits lower and wider from the front lens.
Not what I was expecting. Easy application. It says no bubbles and my phone has a ton of them. Followed the instructions but not very happy with the results.
Cumple con lo que promete. Definitivamente la mejor mica para celular.
Si su plan es una Mica perfecta no la compren. No gasten su dinero.
